name: 基礎儀器治療學
restrict: ◎必須先修過【PEU0193  人體解剖生理學】
description: 使學生了解各種物理治療儀器例如冷療、水療、熱療、電療及機械儀器在治療運動傷害的學理以及應用。
goals: 了解人體組織受傷之後的生理反應及修補機轉
了解疼痛及解除疼痛的機轉與理論
了解冷療、水療、熱療對於治療運動傷害的理論以及應用
了解電療、機械儀器對於治療運動傷害的理論及應用
syllabus:
【授課方式：16+2週】彈性授課周將進行校外參訪與數位多媒體學習

*   Week 1 (9/27)： Introduction/ Therapeutic Modalities: What are they (Chapter 1); EBP/General Application Procedures/ Injury Record Keeping (Chapters 2 - 4)
*   Week 2 (10/4)：Tissue Response to Injury (Chapter 5), **_Lab 1: General Lab Procedure_s**
*   Week 3 (10/11)：國慶日遇例假日補假
*   Week 4 (10/18)：Immediate Care of Acute Orthopedic Injuries(Chapter 6);The Healing Process (Chapter 7)
*   Week 5 (10/25)：Pain and Orthopedic Injuries - 1 (Chapters 8 & 9), **_Lab 2: Compression_**
*   Week 6 (11/1)：Pain and Orthopedic Injuries - 2 (Chapters 8 & 9), **Group assignment 1**: Healing Process
*   Week 7 (11/8)：Thermotherapy (Chapter 10 & 11), **_Lab 4: Thermotherapy /Massage,_** **Group assignment 2**: Pain Control Theory
*   Week 8 (11/15)：Cryotherapy Beyond Immediate Care and Thermotherapy (Chapters 12 & 13)
*   Week 9 (11/22)：**期中考**
*   Week 10 (11/29)：Basic Principles of Electricity (Chapter 16)
*   Week 11 (12/6)：Basic Principles of Electricity (Chapter 16)
*   Week 12 (12/13)：Clinical Applications of Electrical Stimulating Currents (Chapter 17), **Group assignment 3:** Electrical Stimulation
*   Week 13 (12/20)：E-stim Case Studies, Therapeutic Ultrasound (Chapter 14)
*   Week 14 (12/27)：Clinical Applications of Ultrasound (Chapter 14)/ Ultrasound Case Studies
*   Week 15 (1/3/2021)：Diathermy (Chapter 15), Spinal Traction (Chapters 19), **Group assignment 4:** Putting it All Together
    *   校外參訪與實驗課：1/8/2022 6:00 – 8:00 pm (Saturday) **_Lab 5: Electrical Stimulating Currents_****_＆_** **_Ultrasound at_** **_超越復健診所_**
*   Week 16 (1/10/2021)：**期末考**

methodologies.note: 教師課堂搭配投影片講解課程內容。
在課程中穿插問題與討論，促進學生間與教師之互動。
依據模擬情境給予的資訊，以實證研究證據與課程學習內容，針對運動員/病人之需求設計治療課表。
以分組作業 (Group assignment) 促進學生間交流學習機會。
儀器操作實驗/實作/觀摩
參訪運動防護中心與復健診所

grading.note: 四個 Group assignments，各5％ (X peer review %)

prerequisite: ◎必須先修過【PEU0193  人體解剖生理學】
